name: Dirt Offroad Racing
description:
Race to the finish line over a multitude of racing tracks in this crazy Offroad Dirt Racing Game. Experience amazing cars, cutting edge graphics and adrenaline-filled excitement.

Face the challenges of unique uphill & downhill environments with a various available Offroad Cars and race it over spectacular jump filled courses. Launch your truck over huge jumps, timing your throttle action to perfection to show the best performance. Upgrade every part of your vehicle and turn it to a monster.

Features:

• Complete challenging racing roads
• Upgrade your vehicle
• Various available offroad cars
• Climb to the top and be the best Offroad driver ever
• Different Levels all over the world

Download for FREE today and start playing NOW!
